title.description: The translation key or literal text to use as the display name for the inventory.
title.markdownDescription: The translation key or literal text to use as the display name for the inventory.

container_type.description: Determines what type of container the inventory will be similar to.
container_type.markdownDescription: Determines what type of container the inventory will be similar to.

drop_on_death.description: When this is set to true, the player will drop the items in the inventory on death (vanishing items will vanish!).
drop_on_death.markdownDescription: When this is set to true, the player will drop the items in the inventory on death (vanishing items will vanish!).

drop_on_death_filter.description: If this is set, only item stacks matching this condition will be dropped on death.
drop_on_death_filter.markdownDescription: If this is set, only item stacks matching this condition will be dropped on death.

recoverable.description: Determines if the content of the inventory should be dropped upon losing the power.
recoverable.markdownDescription: Determines if the content of the inventory should be dropped upon losing the power.

key.description: Which active key this power should respond to.
key.markdownDescription: Which active key this power should respond to.

type.description:
[Power Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/inventory)

Provides an inventory that can be opened with the specified [Key](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/inventory); may or may not persist on death.

Type ID: `origins:inventory`
